attributes.action: Take immediate action to withdraw the UK from the European Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK contributes in excess of £14 billion per annum (net) to the European Union, or put another way, over £40 million per day. At the same time UK citizens are denied medical treatment on the grounds of cost, while our taxation is being used to build railways in Poland and motorways in Ireland. This is an immoral way for any Government to treat it's citizens, and it should cease immediately - the UK should withdraw from the European Union.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Repeal1972ECACT/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
